text: Eadweard cyng gret Wulfstan biscop & ælfgar eorl & Ricard minne huscarll & ealle mine þegnas on Wigrecestrescire freondlice.
& ic cyðe eow þæt ic habbe geunnen Alfstane munece þæt he beo his sace weorðe & his socne & tolles & teames ofer his land & ofer his menn binnan porte & buton.
& ic nelle geþafian þæt him ænig man ænig unlage beode.
